title: Word Filtering Script Generator
description: Generating scripts that filters certain words from video or audio. When you type the word you want to filter, the video recognizes the word and marks it as '***' in the script.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This workflow generates scripts that filters certain words from video or audio. When you specify the words you wish to filter, Amazon Transcribe recognizes the word and marks it as `***` in the transcript. This feature is useful when you want to erase swear words or slang when creating movie subtitles, or when you want to hide certain words.
